actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the House Report entitled "Second Concurrent Resolution on the Budget-Fiscal Year 1979".

summary.text: Orders the printing of 1,000 additional copies (at a cost not to exceed $1,200) of the House Report entitled "Second Concurrent Resolution on the Budget - Fiscal Year 1979," for use by the House Committee on the Budget.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the House Report entitled "Second Concurrent Resolution on the Budget-Fiscal Year 1979".
